Calculating heat capacity, :math:`C_v` 
=======================================
.. math:: 
	C_v(T) = \frac{\left<E^2\right> - \left<E\right>^2}{T^2}

Download script: :download:`heat_capacity.py <../examples/heat_capacity.py>`.
